full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SKYES BU CHEN PO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA DGYES DGUR SPYOD PA'I SKAL LDAN 'PHRIN LAS RE BSKONG BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES SKYES BU CHEN PO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA DGYES DGUR SPYOD PA'I SKAL LDAN 'PHRIN LAS RE BSKONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, 'JAM GLING YANGS PA'I NOR 'DZIN GYI STOBS KYI 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA GONG MA CHEN MO'I BKA' KHRIMS GSER SKYEMS SPYANGS KYI TZAKRA GYEN 'DEGS KYI SNYING STOBS MNGA' ZHING, RGYAL BSTAN SPYI DANG ZHVA SER BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN MNGON PAR SGRENG BA'I KHUR CHEN 'DEGS PA LA SNYING NAS MOS PA'I AA PA HA NARA PE SE DPAL 'BYOR GYIS, ,CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO 'DI @011B NYID KYI GSOL MCHOD TSANG LA 'KHYER BDE ZHIG DGOS TSUL GYI THUGS BZHED LTAR, GSOL MCHOD KYI RIM PA RNAMS BKA' BSTOD MCHED GSUM DANG, ,RDO RJE SGRA DBYANGS SOGS LA GZHI BYAS NAS, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYI GNANG BA'I LEGS CHA BLANGS ZHING, ,TSIG SBYOR GSAR DU DGOS PA RNAMS BSGRIGS TE, ,CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO'I SDONG GROGS TSUL BZHIN DU MDZAD PA'I SH'AKYA 'BANGS SKU SKYES DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB KYIS, ,SGRA SNYAN 'TSAMS SDEB SOGS KYI GO BA MI SHES KYANG, ,'CHANG RTZOD BRTZOM GSUM GYI BAG CHAGS BZANG PO PA RI ZHING RNAM RDOG MED PA'I DKAR SEMS KYIS, ,RANG GI DAD PAS KYANG 'TSAMS SBYAR TE, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA SKYES BDAG ZHES PA LCAGS MO LUG GI LO, ,RTA BDUN GYI RGYAL PO BUM PA'I KHYIM DU SPYOD CING, ,RI BO GRU 'DZIN PA RTA NYA BA'I DMAR CHA BZANG PO GNYIS PA, ,LHAG PA LHA MTSAMS KYI SGRUB SBYOR, ,DUS 'KHOR DBYANGS AOO, ,GSAL BYED GHOO, ,'DOD YON GZUGS, ,DBYANGS 'CHAR BA RNAMS KYI DBYANGS A'I, ,GSAL BYED DZA, ,'DOD YON RO, ,GNYIS KA MTHUN PA'I 'BYUNG BA CHU, ,DAR RGUD GZHON NU, ,LHAG PA BDUD RTZI'I MTHUN MTSAMS KYI DUS DGE BAR DBU BTZUGS TE BGYI BA'I YI GE PA NI RANG GI GAM DU BCAR BA'I YIG RIG SOGS LA RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I DGE TSUL NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA'O,, ,,)
